response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product is also highly sought after by other potential buyers. Considering its worth to both us and you, I propose a special introductory price of $7,500 for you. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and free shipping within your region. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. If you have any questions or need more information, please feel free to ask. Thank you for considering our product.", "product_price": 7500}
